title: C is for Cold and Dark ‚ùÑÔ∏è master the perfect startup in MSFS 2024
description:
Master the art of the startup in Microsoft Flight Simulator! Today we explore "Cold and Dark"‚Äîthe state where the aircraft is completely powered down. We will do this using the Canadair CL-145! Whether you are flying MSFS 2020 or MSFS 2024, understanding the transition from a cold exterior to a warm, running engine is vital for immersion.

In this episode of our Microsoft Flight Simulator alphabet series, we go beyond the standard checklist. We‚Äôll show you the exterior checks, the cockpit flow to get power online, and the tips you need to start your engines without error. Stick around for a recap and a fun surprise at the end!

16:26 - Engine start procedure (The "Warm" Up)

28:45 - Recap & special surprise

The MSFS Alphabet is designed to help you become a better virtual pilot, one letter at a time. From Ailerons to Zero-Fuel Weight, we cover the primary flight controls and technical terms you need to know.
